In England, in the seven days to 19 March, there were 470,162 new confirmed cases (831.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 March, there were 349,739 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 34% (120,423 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 March is 17,356,644 (30,692.5 cases per 100,000 population).
